long_description: Stroll comfortably in the men's Oboz Sling flip-flops, which deliver a supportive, anatomically-designed fit in a lightweight platform that's great for warm-weather moseying. Narrow nylon webbing straps crisscross insteps and wrap around big toe for a comfortable, secure fit. EVA topsoles feature a textured surface to enhance nonslip performance. Anatomically-shaped topsoles/midsoles provide excellent arch support and heel stability. EVA midsoles offer lightweight cushion for all-day comfort. Nonmarking rubber outsoles have a lightly lugged tread pattern for sure traction at the trailhead or in camp. Closeout.
short_description: Stroll comfortably in the men's Oboz Sling flip-flops, which deliver a supportive, anatomically-designed fit in a lightweight platform that's great for warm-weather moseying.
